name: Zack Urlocker
overview: Zack is a veteran technology executive, with 20 years of enterprise software experience. As Chief Operating Officer, he is responsible for all customer-facing aspects of the business at Zendesk.  Prior to Zendesk, he was EVP of Products at MySQL and responsible for Engineering & Marketing.  MySQL was acquired by Sun Microsystems for $1 billion and is now part of Oracle Corporation.  Zack has also held executive positions at Active Software, webMethods and Borland.  He is a frequent speaker and blogger on using open source and cloud technologies for competitive advantage.  In his spare time he is an occasional marathon runner and blues guitarist.
